H0.text: Which doctor - an eternal optimist – features in Voltaire’s Candide. Pangloss

H1.text: Which doctor - an eternal optimist – features in Voltaire’s Candide. Martin

H2.text: Which doctor - an eternal optimist – features in Voltaire’s Candide. Baron Thunder-ten-tronckh

H3.text: Which doctor - an eternal optimist – features in Voltaire’s Candide. Cacambo

A4.text: Candide was indoctrinated with Leibnizian optimism by his mentor, Professor Pangloss.
